data.text: But the line “there are three million birds on this island but only one matters to him”... sweet God, that line just melted my heart 💔😭... I had a legitimate ‘awwwwweeee’ moment 😍...

These albatross mate for life, but they spend six months apart each year during winter then come back to the same island to mate... this poor male was waiting for her and she was late... typical female firstly 😂😂😂...
